name: Casanchef
description: Revolutionizing kitchen creativity for Casancrem. This intelligent culinary assistant turns fridge leftovers into gourmet meals via WhatsApp. By analyzing text or photos of available ingredients, it delivers personalized recipes in seconds, driving brand engagement and product usage.

name: La IA del Brunch
description: Your ultimate dining companion. Leveraging the Google Places API, this web-based bot curates the perfect brunch spots tailored to your taste and location. Discover hidden gems and top-rated eateries effortlessly, making every meal an experience.

name: NoticIAs dIArIAs
description: Stay ahead of the curve with daily AI insights. This Telegram bot aggregates and summarizes the latest AI news from YouTube, newsletters, and blogs over the last 24 hours. Get a concise, high-impact briefing delivered straight to your phone every morning.

name: Personal Assistant
description: The ultimate productivity powerhouse. A sophisticated multi-agent system running on MAWS that manages your entire digital life. From scheduling Google Calendar events and drafting Gmail replies to controlling Spotify and transcribing audio notesâ€”all through a simple Telegram interface.
